mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.boardId, c.user_id, c.content, c.createCommentDate, c.updateCommentDate, u.nickname FROM comment c JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.boardId = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(boardId, user_id, content) VALUES(#{boardId}, #{user_id}, #{content})
